Description

GunFu Heroes is a quick-paced, multiplayer shoot 'em up where your goal is to be the last of your friends standing. Drawing on favorite games of the genre, GunFu Heroes not only requires fast reflexes, but also tactical strategy and improvisation to beat your opponent. Players will have access to a variety of weapons which each dictate a different style of play. Players will start each round with only a pistol and a sword. By destroying chests or defeating opponents, players can exchange their pistol for different weapons. While the guns provide a tactical long-range option, the sword allows for a good close-range countermeasure. Using the sword not only allows you to quickly dispatch enemies, but also to reflect incoming projectiles back at the sender. If used correctly, a player at a disadvantage could gain the upper hand by a perfectly-timed reflect. No matter your style of play, whether casual or competitive, GunFu Heroes offers something for everyone. The simple yet difficult to master style of combat allows for an endless variety of game play.

History

After winning several awards from local game jams, the team of three brothers decided to create TheFifthWaffle and start work on their first official game: GunFu Heroes. The concept behind the game was simple, it was a four-player competitive game with easy to learn controls but difficult to master combat. The gameplay and artstyle of the game took inspiration from the games that the three co-founders enjoyed playing growing up.

Features

  • Dazzling variety of unlockable skins, weapons, and arenas
  • Nostalgic and colorful pixel art to make characters bounce off the screen
  • Wide variety of weapons with each dictating a new and exciting style of gameplay
  • Interactive level design to keep matches fast-paced and exciting every time
  • Challenge opponents in local multiplayer in free-for-all or team-based games
  • Original 80's inspired soundtrack crafted just for your enjoyment

About TheFifthWaffle

Boilerplate
TheFifthWaffle is a small, indie game company created by three brothers who have a passion for game making and game playing. Inspired by multiplayer and indie titles, TheFifthWaffle aspires to create fun and lasting experiences that are easy to learn but difficult to master.
